release.action: Implemented the Examples search
Fixed possible IndexOutOfBoundsException in the KanjiAnalyzeActivity
Fixed the isHiragana/isKatakana methods: the methods failed to work correctly for small ya, yu, yo characters
The word analysis progress is displayed more accurately
Added the Donate button
Added warning for KanjiDraw about the proper stroke order
Added Japanese-French downloadable dictionary.
Added Japanese-German downloadable dictionary.
When downloading a dictionary, a copyright notice and a dictionary homepage is now shown
You can now directly perform analysis of a notepad entry
Implemented the verb deinflection
Regression: SKIP search finds the kanjis but does not display them
Search Result Browser now shows the dictionary used for the search
Added a notepad functionality
Show hint on reading: Long click on SearchResult and Analysis activity should allow user to see romaji reading of all hiragana/katakana characters
Added more downloadable dictionaries: ENAMDICT and COMPDIC are now downloadable using the Configuration activity.
A very simple and slow sentence translation added.
Added support for analyzing words, not just kanjis.
Added support for multiple EDICT dictionaries.
Implemented the SKIP system lookup.
Fixed regression: added back the missing about dialog.
Exact matches first: When performing a search, best matches and common words are shown first.
Optionally show Romaji instead of katakana/hiragana
Implemented a kanji drawing recognition (a kanjipad)
Implemented Kanji Radical Lookup
Added support for KANJIDIC
Added an Analysis Activity which lists all kanjis and their information.
Configurable results for Simeji. Just long-click on the result list and pick what to return.
The application made more stable by catching all exceptions in event handler
ai.bat ignores command-line parameters and always prints that it missies -f -d or -u argument
Added support for custom dictionary files
Fixed: Crash on Dictionary Download on Donut phones
Added support for both Hepburn and Nihon-Shiki romanization.
The KanaTable writings are now in Hepburn or Nihon-Shiki, depending on the setting
Added support for Simeji.
The hiragana/katakana table is now stored in a Java source instead of in a property file.
Marked as compatible with all screen sizes and Android APIs both 1.5 and 1.6
Added a hiragana/katakana table.
fixes OutOfMemory errors on MacOSX while building dex.
The search result list is now sorted.
Added copy-paste support
Fixed bug with incorrect free space computation
Added the "About" activity.
Initial release.
